CustomField.description: Can only be entered if the Conditions Met is Custom. Enter a combination of the Term Condition Index #s, AND, OR, and parenthesis (e.g. (123 AND 124) AND 125).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Can only be entered if the Conditions Met is Custom. Enter a combination of the Term Condition Index #s, AND, OR, and parenthesis (e.g. (123 AND 124) AND 125).
CustomField.label: Advanced Condition
